Debt and Debt Service Reduction Loan

abstracts.cdata!:
This is the Implementation Completion
            Report (ICR) for the Debt and Debt ServiceReduction Loan
            (DDSR Loan) to the Republic of Ecuador. The objective of the
            operation was to assist the Government in (i) implementing
            debt and debt service reduction; (ii) normalizing relations
            with external creditors; (iii) improving the economic
            environment for attracting foreign investments; and (iv)
            enhancing the continuity and the sustainability of
            macroeconomic policies, particularly fiscal balance. The
            Bank's performance in coordinating support, evaluating
            the project, and processing of the DDSR Loan and the
            set-asides was praiseworthy. The only new lesson that can be
            extracted from the DDSR Loan for Ecuador was the usefulness
            of the decision by the Bank's Executive Board to
            eliminate the segmentation in the use of funds from
            set-asides and DDSR operations.
